author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
`-showwindow` relies on WPF which is not supported on CoreCLR
also removed any `#if` for CoreCLR

doc update https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Docs/pull/1685

comments.author: WilliamXieMSFT
comments.body: With recent announcements for wpf support on dotnetcore 3, would readding this feature be considered in the future?

title: remove unsupported -showwindow switch from get-help
